recipes.title: Javanese Fried Rice
cookSteps: The main ingredient:
Chicken breast, egg noodles, and fresh vegetables.
1. Heat oil in a pot and sauté chopped onion, garlic, carrots, and celery.
2. Add diced chicken breast and cook until lightly browned.
3. Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.
https://zonekapp.com/AndroidStudio/recipe/example.jpg
4. Add egg noodles and let it cook for 8–10 minutes.
5. Season with salt, pepper, and fresh parsley.
6. Serve hot with bread or crackers.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
cookSteps: Boil water.
Add noodles and chicken.
Simmer until cooked.
Season to taste.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
cookSteps: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add chopped tomatoes and basil leaves.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
https://zonekapp.com/AndroidStudio/recipe/example.jpg
Blend until smooth.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
cookSteps: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk eggs and sugar until fluffy.
Combine chocolate mixture with eggs.
Pour batter into molds.
Bake for 12 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream.
